title: The Wuhan Mission
description:
China will soon rule the world, unless... 
The CIA gave her the codename Snow Forest. She escaped China when she was thirteen. Now she must go back and infiltrate the Wuhan laboratory and plan a heist.
Under surveillance she is forced to run, but she has help, and an important passenger.Will Snow Forest escape with the antidote to the virus she is carrying? Or will China succeed in bringing down the world economy?Don't miss the first of the series by Irving Waters.If you like Daniel Silva, Dan Brown or John Le Carr√©, then this thriller will have you turning the pages!
author: Irving Waters
